name: Grand Prix Construction Set
overview: Grand Prix Construction Set is a motor-racing game with a difference: it allows you to design your own race circuits - using straights, fast bends, sharp bends, chicanes and hump back bridges. Or you can select one of the many pre-defined race tracks, which include most of the world's famous Grand Prix venues. Then race against another player, or against the computer - there are five skill levels to choose from.
